Class MethodMetric

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.metrics2.lib.MutableMetric
      • org.apache.hadoop.metrics2.lib.MethodMetric

  •  class MethodMetric
extends MutableMetric
    Metric generated from a method, mostly used by annotation
